courses.name: HTML
courses.author: Sarah Smith
courses.details: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and other information that can be displayed in a web browser. It provides a structure for content and defines how it should be displayed on a web page, including text, images, and multimedia, HTML is essential for creating static web pages and is a foudational technology for the World Wide Web.
